questions.question: 1. Which of the following is a use of a Hash Table ?

answers.a: Storing data in an associative Manner
answers.c: Getting Unique Values in the given data.

questions.question:
2. Which of the following is the correct representation of hash table after doing the mentioned operations ? (Assume hash table size = 5 and all values are initialized as 0)
Insert(25);
Insert(26)
Remove(25);
Insert(50);

explanations.c:
Initially the hash table is [0,0,0,0,0]
After 1st operation Insert(25) -> [25,0,0,0,0]
2nd operation Insert(26) -> [25,26,0,0,0]
3rd operation Remove(25) -> [0,26,0,0,0]
4th operation Insert(50) -> [50,26,0,0,0]
